headline.main: IEA Warns of Oil 'Supply Crunch' by 2020 With No Capex Renaissance
headline.print_headline: IEA Warns of Oil 'Supply Crunch' by 2020 With No Capex Renaissance

lead_paragraph: Global oil supply may struggle to match demand after 2020, when the pinch of a two-year decline in investment in new production could leave spare capacity at a 14-year low and send prices sharply higher, the International Energy Agency said on Monday.
